subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady, the New England Patriots’ record-setting quarterback, drew all but one vote Saturday in romping to the Associated Press N.F.L. Most Valuable Player award in the same manner his team rolled through its schedule, going 16-0.
snippet: Tom Brady, the New England Patriots’ record-setting quarterback, drew all but one vote Saturday in romping to the Associated Press N.F.L. Most Valuable Player award in the same manner his team rolled through its schedule, going 16-0.
